TXT_MARK.P: http://ted.europa.eu/udl?uri=TED:NOTICE:119608-2017:TEXT:EN:HTML&tabId=1
Georgia-Tbilisi: EIB - Georgia - Water infrastructure modernization project / Finance Contract FIN 84.677
United Water Supply Company of Georgia LLC (UWSCG), 0186, 76b Vazha-Pshavela Ave., Tbilisi, Georgia, Tel: + 995 32 291 90 60, Fax: +995 32 222 00 36, E-mail: info@water.gov.ge Web-site: water.gov.ge
The grounds for cancellation include a violation of the principle of equal treatment and a conflict of interest.

BLK_BTX_SEQ.P: Should a new tender procedure be launched for this project, a new contract notice will be published, unless the contracting authority awards the contract through a negotiated procedure – in which case only the award of the contract will be published.

United Water Supply Company of Georgia LLC (UWSCG), 0186, 76b Vazha-Pshavela Ave., Tbilisi, Georgia, Tel: + 995 32 291 90 60, Fax: +995 32 222 00 36, E-mail: info@water.gov.ge Web-site: water.gov.ge
The grounds for cancellation include a violation of the principle of equal treatment and a conflict of interest.

BLK_BTX_SEQ.P: Should a new tender procedure be launched for this project, a new contract notice will be published, unless the contracting authority awards the contract through a negotiated procedure – in which case only the award of the contract will be published.
